lyrics.text: I am a human
and I saw bitterness in my life because I am weak
I am a human
and I saw bitterness in my life because I am weak
and when the world smiled at me and luck called me
I found the people who used to hurt me
standing by my side as if I was in a movie
I am a human
I am a human
and how much you see stories of one person being owned by another person
another person
and people who get lost and people who reach their destination in seconds
and long story short, I learned..
that even if I dreamt one day,
I will never get lost with my dreams
long story short, I learned
I am a human
I am a human
When I became rich, all people came to me
but I falsely accused people who were dear to me
When I became rich, all people came to me
but I falsely accused people who were dear to me
and if I end, I deserve everything that happens to me
and if I end, I deserve everything that happens to me
أنا انسان
وشفت المر في حياتي عشان غلبان
أنا انسان
وشفت المر في حياتي عشان غلبان
ولما الدنيا ضحكت لي وساعة الحظ نادت لي
لقيت الناس اللى كانوا زمان بيستعروا
بقوا جمبي وكأني في فلم من الافلام
أنا انسان
أنا انسان
ويا ما تشوف قصص تاني لواحد تاني
لواحد ثاني
وناس بتتوه وناس توصل فثواني
وانا من الاخر اتعلمت
إني لو  يوم حتى حلمت
عمري ما اتوه مع أحلامي
أناا من الاخر اتعلمت
أنا انسان
أنا انسان
لما اتغنيت  كل الناس جريت عليا
بس افتريت على ناس كانوا عزاز عليا
لما انغنيت  كل الناس جريت عليا
بس افتريت على ناس كانوا عزاز عليا
ولو انتهيت استاهل كل اللي يجرى ليا
لو انتهيت استاهل كل اللي يجرى ليا
Ana Shayef 2albak ya 7abeeby ma3adsh 7'alas Ma3aya
And the end (of our relationship) is coming real soon
We shereet el zekra ely ma benna
I can see it over there
It fades away each day
I had lived it with you
Ma ba2etsh tefakar feya
And your words are so harsh
Before the tears form my eyes water
Please wait for me
Why tie yourself to me
Why do you make my world beautiful
When you don't know how to love
Why did you run to me
How many times had I fooled myself
When I could feel the loss
And apparently this whole time
We were only getting closer to "good-bye"
You hurt me and I conceal it and say
Maybe because
Her wound wasn't less
Than the past
And I pay
The cost of loyalty
The price of affection
You no longer think of me
And your words are so harsh
Before the tears form my eyes water
Please wait for me
Why tie yourself to me
Why do you make my world beautiful
When you don't know how to love
Why did you run to me
A hundred times I had told my heart
The love between us is gone
And my heart would say "not yet"
And leave me in my wounds
You hurt me and I conceal it and say
Maybe because
Her wound wasn't less
Than the past
And I pay
The cost of loyalty
The price of affection
You no longer think of me
And your words are so harsh
Before the tears form my eyes water
Please wait for me
Why tie yourself to me
Why do you make my world beautiful
When you don't know how to love
Why did you run to me

[Mohamed Adaweya]
With your hands1 you can change all around.
With your eyes you can see a lot of details
(There are) a lot of stories that have been living for years thanks to your hands,
lines that draw a step, a step that knows its way
With your skill you can get closer to us
It's you who articulate, with your hand, about us
Your creations2 will keep on living in homes,
will become more precious with every passing year
Get closer, search in memories
You may find tomorrow in past's eyes
Get closer, fill your days, oh, with colors
The world becomes prettier once it is seen by an artist's eyes
[Zap Tharwat]
I wonder, I've never seen such an unappreciated treasure!,
such hands that should be wrapped in silk3, in a scented silk
the last one standing of such artisans4
In every corner, in every house there is a chapter from his novel5
He's a rare bird6, an extremely skillfully-cast coin
whose details are written, are curved in every workshop,
whose lines connects "Nubia" with with "Faiyum" and Upper Egypt7
Whose stronger-than-steel textile has been living for years
Do you love a handicraft? then teach8 it to others
It's your father's, your grandfather's legacy and it shall pass to your descendants
Show them what does "skill" mean, tell them your story
Let the end of story turns to be a start for you
[Mohamed Adaweya]
With your skill you can get closer to us
It's you who articulate, with your hand, about us
Your creations2 will keep on living in homes,
will become more precious with every passing year
[محمد عدوية]
بكف ايديك تقدر تبدل كل شئ حواليك
تقدر تشوف تفاصيل كتيرة بعنيك
بكف ايديك حواديت كتيرة عاشت سنين وسنين
خطوط بترسم خطوة عارفة طريقها فين
تقدر بموهبتك تقرّب مننا
مانت اللي بتعبر بإيدك عننا
فنّك هيفضل بكرة عايش في البيوت
وهتغلى قيمته كل ما يقدم سنة
قرّب كمان ارجع ودوّر جوه الذكريات
يمكن تلاقي بكرة في عيون اللي فات
قرّب كمان املا أيامك آااه بالألوان
الدنيا أجمل لما تشوفها بعين فنان
[زاب ثروت]
مستغرب عمري ما شفت كنز مش متقدّر
ايدين تتلف ف حرير ويكون متعطّر
آخر واحد باقي لينا من صنعته
في كل ركن ف كل بيت جزء من قصته
ده عملة نادرة مرسومة بكل حرفة
تفاصيلها مكتوبة و محفورة ف كل ورشة
وخيوطها رابطة النوبة بالفيوم والصعيد
ونسيجها عايش من سنين أقوى من الحديد
بتحب حاجة؟ علّمها للي حواليك
ده ورث أبوك وجدك لازم يعيش بعديك
وريهم معنى الموهبة واحكي للناس حكايتك
خلي نهاية الحكاية تتقلب وتكون بدايتك
[محمد عدوية]
تقدر بموهبتك تقرّب مننا
مانت اللي بتعبر بإيدك عننا
فنك هيفضل بكرة عايش في البيوت
وهتغلى قيمته كل ما يقدم سنة
It was his very last minute (in life),
'n he was though thinking about her
She was holding him tight
with his head resting on her hands
An' once her tears touched his cheek,
he sensed it and looked toward her.
And with all the power left in him
he tried to sweep these tears away.
An' once her tears touched his cheek,
he sensed it and looked to her.
And with all the power left in him
he tried to sweep these tears away.
This moment was indescribable
This moment was beyond any words1
In this very moment I was leaving2
An' for it3 he was willing to live.
This moment was indescribable
This moment was beyond any words
In this very moment I was leaving
An' for it he was willing to live.
Then her image started to fade
an' to show again to his eyes.
With a choking voice he told her (then):
"Do not ever forget me 4"
Putting her hand on her lips, She said:
"it's your tenderness that keeps me alive"
Tighter she embraced him, saying:
"You still have a long time to live"
Putting her hand on her lips, She said:
"it's your tenderness that keeps me alive"
Tighter she embraced him, saying:
"You still have a long time to live"
This moment was indescribable
This moment was beyond any words
In this very moment I was leaving
An' for it he was willing to live.
This moment was indescribable
This moment was beyond any words
In this very moment I was leaving
An' for it he was willing to live.
This moment was indescribable
This moment was beyond any words
In this very moment I was leaving
An' for it he was willing to live.
This moment was indescribable
This moment was beyond any words
In this very moment I was leaving
An' for it he was willing to live.
it was the last minute in his life...he was also thinking of her
she was holding him in her lap...sleeping his head on her hands
and when she touched his tears , he was gone...he will still think of her and he will stay only for her
and with the power left in him...he wanted to wipe her tears
and when she touched his tears , he was gone...he will still think of her and he will stay only for her
and with the power left in him...he wanted to wipe her tears
it was a moment can never be explained ... it was a moment can never be spoken
it was a moment which i walked in...and for it he wanted to live
it was a moment can never be explained ... it was a moment can never be spoken
it was a moment which i walked in...and for it he wanted to live
and for it he wanted to live
and her image started to fade away from his eyes then get back again
at that moment, he said with a broken voice....don't forget me in anyday
he was putting her hands on his lips...she said i'm living in ur craving
she hugged him stronger than before...and said there is much left to u
he was putting her hands on his lips...she said i'm living in ur craving
she hugged him stronger than before...and said there is much left to u

She is the one who took me out of myself*
She is the one who makes me feel
as if I had the whole world by loving her
I've met a lot (of people/girls) and I was afraid
but my heart believed her, once I saw her eyes
I said: i found her, she's the one
Sometimes I'm dying** to see her
How much I miss her fear,
her shyness when she longs for me
That's the life I was dying** to live. Now I found it thanks to her
A dream I've dreamed and am dying** to (make it true)
She is the one, with whom I started to feel
that all what I've missed in my life can be restored by her hands
She makes you forget anyone***
She is the one who really deserve
to live for. What could be an objection ?
Sometimes I'm dying** to see her
How much I miss her fear,
her shyness when she longs for me
That's the life I was dying** to live. Now I found it thanks to her
A dream I've dreamed and am dying** to (make it true)
Sometimes I'm dying** to see her
How much I miss her fear,
her shyness when she longs for me
That's the life I was dying** to live. Now I found it thanks to her
A dream I've dreamed and am dying** to (make it true)

englishTranslations.title: The one who took me out of myself

lyrics.text: دي اللي خدتني مني
ودي اللي بتحسسني اني
ملكت كل الدنيا ديا عشان لقيتها
قابلت كتير وخوفت
وقلبي صدقها اما شوفت عنيها
قولت ساعتها بس خلاص لقيتها
وببقى هموت واشوفها
وقد ايه بيوحشني خوفها
كسوفها لما بكون واحشها
دى دنيا كنت هموت واعيشها لقيتها بيها
حلم حلمت بيه كنت هموت عليه
دي اللى معاها بس بدأت احس
ان اللي فات دلوقتي ممكن بين ايديها ف لحظة يرجع
تنسيك اي حد
اهي دي اللي تستاهل بجد
انك تعيش ليها الحياة ايه اللى يمنع ؟
وببقى هموت واشوفها
وقد ايه بيوحشني خوفها
كسوفها لما بكون واحشها
دى دنيا كنت هموت واعيشها لقيتها بيها

كسوفها لما بكون واحشها
دى دنيا كنت هموت واعيشها لقيتها بيها
حلم حلمت بيه كنت هموت عليه
Liel ya leil ya liel*1
This world is unfair, underestimate some people and raise others
Cruel on some people and waste their dreams
ya liel (oh my night)
Forgive me, father! we are in middle of a forest
and love is forbidden for the poor
Believe me, father! don't surprise, we are slaves to wolves*2
The stronger can eat the other, and erase him from the world
Even the people who i was feeling safe with them
They sold me out and betrayed me in a moment
They're two-faced and separated us not caring about who am i to them
They're two-faced and separated us not caring about the good years we had
The stronger can eat the other, and erase him from the world
ليل يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل يا ليليى يا ليل
ودى دنيا بتظلم ناس
وناس تعليها
وبتقسى اوى على ناس
والحلم بيضيع بيها
يا ليل يا ليلى ياليل
سامحني يابا انا وسط غابة
والعشق ممنوع على الغلابة
صدقنى يابا من غير غرابة
احنا عبيد فيها للديابة
اللى يقدر على التانى ياكله
ويمحى اسمة من الكتابة
ياه حتى الناس اللى كانو
بحس معاهم بالامان
باعوا وفى لحظة قدروا وخانوا
عادونى فجأة وكلة باع
طلعوا بوشين
قسمونا اتنين
ولا فارق عندهم انا مين
طلعو بوشين
قسمونا اتنين
ولا فارق عشرة ولا سنين
اللى يقدر على التانى ياكله
ويمحى اسمة من الكتابة
Quiet, enough, I don’t hear anymore
As you decided to betray, leave and forget me
Bye, enough, my love you
are the criminal
Separation and quarrel became the normal
Quiet, enough, I don’t hear anymore
As you decided to betray, leave and forget me
Bye, enough, my love you are the criminal
Separation, quarrel became the normal
سكوت خلاص مبقتش بسمع بتاني
مدام نويت تبيع روح وانساني
سلام خلاص حبيبي ما انت الجاني
فراق خصام خلاص ده بقى شيئ عادى
سكُوت خَلاص مبقتش بِسَمْع بَتّانِي
مُدام نَوَيتِ تَبِيع رُوح وَإِنْسانِيّ
سَلام خَلاص حَبِيبَيْ ما أَنْتِ الجانِي
فَراقَ خصام خَلاص ده بَقَّيْ شَيْئ عادِيّ
Set free yourself* and dance
in my hands, touch
my embrace (= chest) with your hands, laugh,
bend on my ear and whisper
Set free yourself and dance
in my hands, touch
my embrace with your hands, laugh,
bend on my ear and whisper
Do you know what (I have) in mind ?
Do you know what I wish to do ?
I want to take you (right away)
and run to our home
My hand is on yours, just like this
Bend on my embrace (= my chest) , like this
Are you and I dancing together
on earth or in heaven ?
(Can) you hear my heartbeat
as your cheek is right on it (= my heart) ?
(can) you hear every single beat ?
(Can) you understand what is it saying (= beat) ?
Set free yourself and dance
in my hands, touch
my embrace with your hands, laugh,
bend on my ear and whisper

سيبي روحك وارقصي
بين ايديا والمسي
حضني بايديكي واضحكي
وعلي ودني ميلي واهمسي
سيبي روحك وارقصي
بين ايديا والمسي
حضني بايديكي واضحكي
وعلي ودني ميلي واهمسي
عارفه ايه في بالي؟
عارفه نفسي في ايه؟
عايز دلوقتي اشيلك
وبيتنا نجري عليه
ايدي علي ايدك كده
ميلي علي حضني كده
انتي وانا بنرقص سوا
ع الأرض ولا علي السما
قلبي .. سامعه قلبي
وانتي خدك عليه؟
سامعه كل دقه؟
فاهمه بتقول ايه؟
سيبي روحك وارقصي
بين ايديا والمسي
حضني بايديكي واضحكي
وعلي ودني ميلي واهمسي
She started crying and went telling people that I purposely got rid of her and lost her

Oh if you knew what I’m feeling and how does a heart live his days not finding someone to warm it and feel safe. My heart’s mistake I loved her and placed her in my heart and her home was left and the love I had with her. It went my heart like it was nothing.

This is my karma because I loved her and this is its end after I was scared of her tear falling on her cheek and showing. And now she’s living in someone else’s heart who gives her greedy love. Ah if she was in my place she would feel deprived.
After you I swear I will live and bear and walk the same road again and get over you. I swear my heart learnt how to cope with sadness.
قعدت تبكى و مشيت تحكى
قالت للناس كلها انى قاصد ازلها وانى انا ضيعتها
أه لو تعرف اللى انا فيه و ازاى قلب عاش لياليه
مش لاقى حضن يدفيه ولا يحس معاه بامان
غلطة قلبى انى انا حبتها سكنتها قلبى و بقى بيتها
و الحب اللى انا عشته معاها راح يا قلبى كانه ما كان
هو جزاتى عشان حبتها بقى يعنى هو ده اخرتها
بعد ما كنت بخاف دمعتها تنزل على خدها و تبان
وهى دلوقتى كمان فيتانى عيشه بقلب و حب انانى
و اه لو كانت هى مكانى كانت حست بالحرمان
بعدك والله هعيش و اتحمل و امشى المشوار تانى و اكمل
منك والله القلب اتعلم ازاى يقدر على الاحزان

but I had to walk a route
that I had to take against my will

that in my life I will live like a rolling stone without a destination

its too late for my dreams

rebuild it and reshape it all over from the beginning

وكان نفسى اعيش فى الخير
وابعد بعيد عن الشر
بس اتكتبلى طريق
ومشيته وانا مضطر
جايز اكون غلطان
وجايز لقيت الحل
انى فى حياتى اعيش
ولا تلاقيلى بر
ايامى الحلوة بعدها
احلامى راحة وقتها
وسنينى مكتوبلى اهدها
من تانى واغير شكلها
محكوم عليا اعيش
مع ناس بتهوى الشر
مع ناس لا ليها كبير
ولا حست فى يوم بالمر
دنيا عجيبة فى امرها
فى ناس تحب تذلها
وناس بتيجى لعندها
وتديها اللى فى نفسها
زعلان منها وبحبها
صعبان عليا ظلمها
وهعيش واموت على ارضها
برضاها و غصب عنها
يا ليل يا ليل
